description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              ***JOB DESCRIPTION
              
              - Database systems are mostly Oracle for many applications/system: Core, Card, ERP, etc.
              
              - Keep the database up and running smoothly 24/7.
              
              - Managing highly available database infrastructure, backup, restore and fail-over processes.
              
              - Working with both back-end/front-end developers in software engineering process to obtain the high quality products.
              
              - Building database systems of high availability and quality depending on each end user’s specialized role.
              
              - Optimizing database for high performance.
              
              - Ability to research, apply new data technologies.
              
              - Determine, enforce and document database policies, procedures and standards.
              
              - Monitor database performance, implement changes and apply new patches and versions when required.
              

              ***BENEFIT
              
              - Working from Monday to Friday
              
              - Salary: Negotiate
              
              - Bonus: 300% of basic salary
              
              - Social insurance; health insurance & unemployment insurance will be paid according to Vietnam Labor Law.
              
              - PTI Health insurance for all employees every year.
              
              - Every year, there are travel programs and training programs in Korea for excellent employees.
              
              - Professional working environment, development and promotion opportunities.
              
              - Annual salary increase policy.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              ***REQUIREMENTS
              
              - Graduate from University of Science and Technology, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, etc.
              
              - At least 2 years working experience.
              
              - Good problem solving skills.
              
              - Hands-on experience with database standards and end user application.
              
              - Have experiences with Big Data for SQL Server of Microsoft is a plus.
              
              - Have experience in Business Intelligence field or any OCA/OCP certificates is a plus.
              
              - Excellent knowledge of data backup, recovery, security, integrity and SQL.
              
              - Fluent in English or Korean.
              

              ***OTHER REQUIREMENT
              
              - Working place:
              
              Head Office of Wooribank Vietnam, 34th floor, Keangnam Hanoi Landmark 72, E6 Pham Hung Street, Me Tri Ward, Nam Tu Liem District, Hanoi.
              
              - CV in English or Korean.
              
              - CV with portrait (do not use selfie photos or not suitable photos).
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
